allow: Bash(pnpm --filter @horus/backend add express cors dotenv bcrypt jsonwebtoken zod @prisma/client)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add security hardening and Railway deployment config

Security improvements:
- Add Helmet middleware for HTTP security headers
- Configure CORS with environment-based allowed origins
- Implement rate limiting (general + strict for auth endpoints)
- Add request body size limits
- Run container as non-root user

Deployment configuration:
- Add optimized Dockerfile for backend (multi-stage, healthcheck)
- Add Dockerfile for frontend (Nginx for static files)
- Add nginx.conf with gzip, caching, and SPA routing
- Update railway.toml configuration

Other changes:
- Fix TypeScript glob type errors in tsconfig
- Update dependencies (helmet, express-rate-limit)
- Various bug fixes and improvements

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Security improvements:

Deployment configuration:

- Add Dockerfile for frontend (Nginx for static files)

Other changes:

EOF
)")

Bash(git -C /c/Desarrollo/Horus2 commit -m "fix: copy Prisma generated client in Dockerfile

The Prisma client is generated in src/generated/prisma/ but was not being
copied to the production container, causing the app to fail on startup.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")

Bash(git -C /c/Desarrollo/Horus2 commit -m "fix: shared package tsconfig - disable composite for proper emit

The composite option was preventing TypeScript from emitting JS files
for the shared package, causing the build to fail in Railway.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")

Bash(git -C /c/Desarrollo/Horus2 commit -m "fix: force clean build of shared package in Docker

Add rm -rf dist before pnpm build to ensure the shared package
is always rebuilt fresh, avoiding Docker cache issues.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")

Bash(git -C /c/Desarrollo/Horus2 commit -m "fix: use pnpm workspace structure in production Dockerfile

The previous approach of copying node_modules directly didn''t work
because pnpm uses symlinks and hoisting. Now we:
1. Copy the full workspace structure (pnpm-workspace.yaml, package.json, pnpm-lock.yaml)
2. Install production dependencies with pnpm install --prod
3. Copy built files to their proper workspace locations
4. Set WORKDIR to apps/backend for the CMD

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")

Bash(git -C /c/Desarrollo/Horus2 commit -m "chore: sync pnpm-lock.yaml with web package.json

The lockfile was out of sync because express was added to web
dependencies but the lockfile wasn''t regenerated.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")
